name: open-product-accessibility-template
description: OPAT schema validator and output generator

scripts.generate-example-output: npx ts-node src/opat.ts output -f tests/examples/valid.yaml -c catalog/2.4-edition-wcag-2.0-508-en.yaml -o tests/examples/valid.markdown
scripts.generate-drupal-output: npx ts-node src/opat.ts output -f opat/drupal-9.yaml -c catalog/2.4-edition-wcag-2.0-508-en.yaml -o opat/drupal-9.markdown
scripts.generate-example-html: npx ts-node src/opat.ts output -f tests/examples/valid.yaml -c catalog/2.4-edition-wcag-2.0-508-en.yaml -o tests/examples/valid.html
scripts.generate-drupal-html: npx ts-node src/opat.ts output -f opat/drupal-9.yaml -c catalog/2.4-edition-wcag-2.0-508-en.yaml -o opat/drupal-9.html
